author: Slidebean
description:
Visa and Mastercard want to control the future of crypto payments.

They’re not betting on Bitcoin, they’re betting on stablecoins.
Visa has already moved $12B on-chain.
Mastercard is teaming up with USDC.
They want crypto rails for global payments and they want to own the tracks.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Visa and Mastercard position stablecoins at the center of global payments

author: Slidebean
description:
Europe creates talent, the US creates trillion dollar companies.

Europe produces more scientists and developers than the US… yet it has zero trillion dollar tech companies. 

Meanwhile, the US has 88. The issue isn’t innovation it’s late stage funding. When it’s time to scale, American startups can raise 4× more capital than European ones.

In 2024, the combined value of all public companies in Europe is $2.6T barely more than a single Apple. Europe doesn’t have a creativity problem.

It has a scaling problem.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Europe makes the talent. America makes the trillionaires.
